name: GLO
description: The project is about GLO, a one-eyed glowing traveler who symbolizes guidance, hope, and illumination. His endless journey reflects the project’s vision of never stopping, always pushing forward, and continuously creating new paths for others to follow. GLO’s radiant glow is not just a light—it is a beacon that represents clarity, direction, and inspiration. Through him, the project embodies progress, unity, and the power to guide communities through uncertainty, ensuring that no one is left in the dark.
